languages.text: "Всего лишь искатель знания. Хотя эксперименты, которые я произвел, действительно выходят далеко за пределы дозволенного обычному трансмеханику, обслуживающему планетарный вокс-массив. Но с тех пор, как я уловил странный сигнал, мой слух открылся тому, что ранее я почитал запретной областью познания. С тех пор я каждую ночь настраивал свою вокс-станцию на эту частоту и слушал голоса".

"Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."
languages.original_text: "Всего лишь искатель знания. Хотя эксперименты, которые я произвел, действительно выходят далеко за пределы дозволенного обычному трансмеханику, обслуживающему планетарный вокс-массив. Но с тех пор, как я уловил странный сигнал, мой слух открылся тому, что ранее я почитал запретной областью познания. С тех пор я каждую ночь настраивал свою вокс-станцию на эту частоту и слушал голоса".

traits.locale_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. Although, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary Transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my hearing was opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I've been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: 「知識の探究者にすぎない。しかし、私が行った実験は、惑星のヴォクス・アレイの維持を任された通常のトランスメカニックに許可された限界をはるかに超えていた。だが、あの奇妙な信号を受けてからずっと、かつての私が禁じられた知識だと思っていたものを進んで取り入れるようになった。それから毎晩、私はヴォクスステーションをその周波に合わせ、その声に聞き入っていた」
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: 「知識の探究者にすぎない。しかし、私が行った実験は、惑星のヴォクス・アレイの維持を任された通常のトランスメカニックに許可された限界をはるかに超えていた。だが、あの奇妙な信号を受けてからずっと、かつての私が禁じられた知識だと思っていたものを進んで取り入れるようになった。それから毎晩、私はヴォクスステーションをその周波に合わせ、その声に聞き入っていた」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “我不过是个求知者罢了，只是我所做的实验，远远超出了普通的传讯修士负责的范围。身为传讯修士，我的任务是维护某颗行星上的音阵通讯站，但自从某一天，我收到了那个古怪的信号之后，我就彻底打开了心灵，学到了那些我以往视为禁忌的知识。在那之后，我每天晚上都会把我的音阵通讯站调到那个频率，聆听那些声音。”
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: “我不过是个求知者罢了，只是我所做的实验，远远超出了普通的传讯修士负责的范围。身为传讯修士，我的任务是维护某颗行星上的音阵通讯站，但自从某一天，我收到了那个古怪的信号之后，我就彻底打开了心灵，学到了那些我以往视为禁忌的知识。在那之后，我每天晚上都会把我的音阵通讯站调到那个频率，聆听那些声音。”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Nur ein Wissenssucher. Allerdings gehen meine Experimente weit über die erlaubten Grenzen eines gewöhnlichen Transmechanikers hinaus, der nur eine planetaren Voxmatrix warten soll. Aber seit ich dieses seltsame Signal empfangen habe, sind meine Ohren offen für das, was ich früher für verbotenes Wissen gehalten habe. Ich stelle meine Voxstation jede Nacht auf diese Frequenz und lausche den Stimmen."
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Wissenssucher. Allerdings gehen meine Experimente weit über die erlaubten Grenzen eines gewöhnlichen Transmechanikers hinaus, der nur eine planetaren Voxmatrix warten soll. Aber seit ich dieses seltsame Signal empfangen habe, sind meine Ohren offen für das, was ich früher für verbotenes Wissen gehalten habe. Ich stelle meine Voxstation jede Nacht auf diese Frequenz und lausche den Stimmen."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Je ne suis qu'un humble aspirant à la connaissance. Cependant, les expériences que j'ai menées dépassent de loin les prérogatives dévolues à un transmécanicien ordinaire chargé d'entretenir l'émetteur-vox planétaire. Mais depuis que j'ai reçu cet étrange signal, mes oreilles sont ouvertes à ce que je considérais auparavant comme un savoir interdit. Chaque nuit depuis lors, je règle mon poste-vox sur cette fréquence et j'écoute les voix. »
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis qu'un humble aspirant à la connaissance. Cependant, les expériences que j'ai menées dépassent de loin les prérogatives dévolues à un transmécanicien ordinaire chargé d'entretenir l'émetteur-vox planétaire. Mais depuis que j'ai reçu cet étrange signal, mes oreilles sont ouvertes à ce que je considérais auparavant comme un savoir interdit. Chaque nuit depuis lors, je règle mon poste-vox sur cette fréquence et j'écoute les voix. »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «Solo soy un mero buscador de conocimientos. Sin embargo, los experimentos que he llevado a cabo van mucho más allá de los límites impuestos a un transmecánico ordinario encargado del mantenimiento de una matriz de vocos planetaria. Pero cuando recibí aquella extraña señal, mis oídos se abrieron a lo que previamente consideraba saberes prohibidos. Desde entonces, todas las noches sintonizo la misma frecuencia en mi estación de voco y escucho las voces».
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: «Solo soy un mero buscador de conocimientos. Sin embargo, los experimentos que he llevado a cabo van mucho más allá de los límites impuestos a un transmecánico ordinario encargado del mantenimiento de una red de vocos planetaria. Pero cuando recibí aquella extraña señal, mis oídos se abrieron a lo que previamente consideraba saberes prohibidos. Desde entonces, todas las noches sintonizo la misma frecuencia en mi estación de voco y escucho las voces».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Yalnızca bilgi peşindeki bir kimseyim. Ancak gerçekleştirdiğim deneyler, gezegenin voks anteninin bakımını yapmakla görevli, sıradan bir transmekaniğin yetkilerini epey aşıyor. O tuhaf sinyali aldığımdan beri kulaklarım, daha önceden yasaklı bilgi olarak değerlendirdiğim şeylere açıldı. O zamandan beri her gece voks istasyonumu belli bir frekansa ayarlayıp sesleri dinliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Merely a seeker of knowledge. However, the experiments I have conducted extend far beyond the allowed limits of an ordinary transmechanic tasked with maintaining a planetary vox-array. But ever since I received that strange signal, my ears have been opened to what I had previously considered to be forbidden knowledge. Every night since then, I have been tuning my vox-station to that very frequency and listening to the voices."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca bilgi peşindeki biriyim. Ancak gerçekleştirdiğim deneyler, gezegenin voks anteninin bakımını yapmakla görevli sıradan bir transmekaniğe izin verilen sınırların çok ötesine uzanıyor. O tuhaf sinyali aldığımdan beri kulaklarım, daha önceden yasaklı bilgi olarak değerlendirdiğim şeylere açıldı. O zamandan beri her gece voks istasyonumu belli bir frekansa ayarlıyorum ve sesleri dinliyorum."
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
